Uses of Interface
io.craigmiller160.stockmarket.stock.StockDownloader

  • Packages that use StockDownloader 
    Package Description
    io.craigmiller160.stockmarket.stock
    Provides the classes necessary to create Stock objects for this program.

    • Uses of StockDownloader in io.craigmiller160.stockmarket.stock

      Classes in io.craigmiller160.stockmarket.stock that implement StockDownloader 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  StockFileDownloader
      A special variation on the StockDownloader interface, designed to load the stock's data from file.
      class  YahooStockDownloader
      Implemented StockDownloader utilizing Yahoo!Finance's online service to acquire stock data.
